package com.xworkz.controlStatements;

public class naturalNumbers {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
int sum=0;
for(int i=1;i<=20;i++)
{
	sum=sum+i;
}
System.out.println(sum);
}
	}





package com.xworkz.controlStatements;

public class DisplayCompanyNames {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		String itCompanies[]= {"Infosys", "wipro", "HP", "Mindtree", "HCL", "Bioclinica"};
		for(int i=0;i<6;i++) 
		{
			System.out.println(itCompanies[i]);
			
		}
	}

}





package com.xworkz.controlStatements;

public class oddNaturalNumbers {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		for(int i=1;i<=300;i++) {
			if(i%2!=0) {
				System.out.println(i);
			}
		}
			}

		}



package com.xworkz.controlStatements;

public class evenNaturalNumbers {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
for(int i=1;i<=300;i++) {
	if(i%2==0) {
		System.out.println(i);
	}
}
	}

}




package com.xworkz.controlStatements;

public class divisionByThree {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		for(int i=1;i<=100;i++) {
			if(i%3==0) {
				System.out.println(i);
			
			}
		}
			}

		}




package com.xworkz.controlStatements;

public class division {

	public static void main(String[] args) {

	// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
for(int i=1;i<=200;i++) 
{
	if(i%2==0 && i%6==0)
	{
		System.out.println(i);
	
	}
}
	}

}




package com.xworkz.controlStatements;

public class divisibleBy {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		

		for(int i=1;i<=200;i++) 
		{
			if(i%3==0 || i%5==0)
			{
				System.out.println(i);
			
			}
		}
			}

		}
